== FRS Obit ==
the link seems to have died, - it does however look as if the obit is used as one of the main sources for the ODNB article on him http://www.oxforddnb.com/view/article/34100 both are subscription sources, and since the ODNB can be accesed by any UK library member, taht might be preferable as a source. [[User:David Underdown|David Underdown]] ([[User talk:David Underdown|talk]]) 09:34, 18 April 2008 (UTC)
----------
I have updated the obituary link, it should now work. Thanks for adding the ODNB refs though, as you say they are more accessible than the JSTOR link and one cannot over reference an article. Cheers - [[User:Dumelow|Dumelow]] ([[User talk:Dumelow|talk]]) 16:32, 18 April 2008 (UTC)
{{Talk:Charles Inglis (engineer)/GA1}}
